title: Woodson The Negro in Our History - claim

content.question: Which of the following best explains Woodson’s claim about race and intelligence?

choices.label: There is no correlation between race and intelligence.
Different races have many unique intellectual standards.
One legacy of the institution of slavery was African Americans’ struggles in educational settings.
Some cultures value education more than others.

content.answer: There is no correlation between race and intelligence.

topic.text: 3.15: Black History Education and African American Studies

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
